course.title: Dramatic Screenwriting II: Workshop
course.description: We'll examine films and screenplays in order to develop the skills necessary to write the first draft of a feature-length script. We'll begin by honing our treatments and outlines, and move on to critiquing specific scenes in our own work and in produced screenplays, with a rigorous focus on character, dialogue, tone, structure, plot, and voice.
course.notes: Admission based on submitted samples of writing. For information on specific application requirements, please see the English Department's Creative Writing web page.
